title: Make sure you don't say anything to anyone, /mute all

embed.description: So just got banned, and nothing is telling me why exactly i was banned, from memory your supposed to be able to find out when you first log back in, and that never happened.

body:
These chat logs, got me from no ban history, to a 14 day ban, and i am making a new thread, because the old one everyone may not see.

This tells me a few things.

GD'ers are being targeted
A large majority of the League population should be banned based on this.
Your best bet to not get banned is just /mute all
Don't ever defend your teammates from flamers, lest you get reported and banned.

[1:12] JasonWazza (Thresh): music is muted
[18:51] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): RIP
[21:48] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): i've done my job bot
[22:57] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): another one
[24:17] JasonWazza (Thresh): says feeding lux
[24:51] JasonWazza (Thresh): you need to learn to not feed your ass off
[25:21] JasonWazza (Thresh): lux
[25:23] JasonWazza (Thresh): your 0/6
[25:25] JasonWazza (Thresh): stop talking
[25:41] JasonWazza (Thresh): i got my adc fed
[25:48] JasonWazza (Thresh): how am I the one not focusing on the game?
[26:35] JasonWazza (Thresh): your the mid laner that caused the free inhib
[26:39] JasonWazza (Thresh): i don't control your feeding
[28:20] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): i like how our lux
[28:25] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): is trying to blame everyone else
[28:30] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): for her feeding her ass off
[28:34] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): it's so entertaining
[28:54] JasonWazza (Thresh): yes you fucking are
[29:06] JasonWazza (Thresh): you were just whineing about me feeding our adc
[29:53] JasonWazza (Thresh): LUX YOU LOST LANE
[29:59] JasonWazza (Thresh): YOU LOSING LANE IS WHY WE ARE LOSING
[30:08] JasonWazza (Thresh): DON'T BLAME A DOWNED INHIB ON ANYONE ELSE
[30:46] JasonWazza (Thresh): lux you died so often, no one can always be mid for that
[31:07] JasonWazza (Thresh): you and riven are why we are losing
[31:17] JasonWazza (Thresh): you can't blame people for your inability to not feed
[32:37] JasonWazza (Thresh): i can blame you for dying 7 times
[32:41] JasonWazza (Thresh): *
[32:44] JasonWazza (Thresh): 8
[32:50] JasonWazza (Thresh): being not as good
[32:54] JasonWazza (Thresh): is not an excuse to feed
[33:42] JasonWazza (Thresh): LUX WE CAN'T WIN
[33:44] JasonWazza (Thresh): YOU FUCKED US
[33:52] JasonWazza (Thresh): DON'T PRETEND WE CAN CARRY YOUR FAT ASS
[34:15] JasonWazza (Thresh): it's not my inability
[34:26] JasonWazza (Thresh): it's your inability to not just sit back and farm
[34:45] JasonWazza (Thresh): it's not about you not being good enough
[34:53] JasonWazza (Thresh): being good enough has nothing to do with feeding
[34:56] JasonWazza (Thresh): your feeding
[35:00] JasonWazza (Thresh): that is the issue

[14:26] JasonWazza (Thresh): hey swain
[14:33] JasonWazza (Thresh): uninstall league for me
[14:58] JasonWazza (Thresh): lol
[15:05] JasonWazza (Thresh): you have same brain issues to work on
[19:05] JasonWazza (Thresh): thank swain for that
[20:05] [All] JasonWazza (Thresh): not sure i would call this a good game honestly

[7:08] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): fizz and riven feeding
[7:12] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): sounds about right
[7:50] JasonWazza (Poppy): why would i?
[7:58] JasonWazza (Poppy): you getting dumpstered
[8:01] JasonWazza (Poppy): and are always dead
[9:46] JasonWazza (Poppy): wow the feeding useless fizz is amazing
[18:27] JasonWazza (Poppy): #normsexcusesfeeding
[20:15] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): no that's what happens when riven feeds
[20:36] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): why would i gank a feeding riven?
[22:10] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): meanwhile fizz is being useless
[22:15] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): and riven is afk
[22:27] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): lol again
[22:32] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): complaints about me not ganking
[22:38] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): 1. You don't gank feeding lanes
[22:50] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): 2. Riven and Fizz are shit lanes to gank for
[22:56] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): 3. Ganking a fed
[23:05] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): Brand and Kennen makes no sense
[23:22] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): norms excuses feeding
[23:38] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): yes we are
[24:02] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): nothing can be fixed when they feed their asses off and are trash bronzies
[24:09] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): btw i won't get banned because i am right ;)
[24:48] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): then why haven't i been banned before?
[24:54] [All] JasonWazza (Poppy): i talk like this all the time

[1:28] [All] JasonWazza (Skarner): meh i'm a jungler
[13:11] [All] JasonWazza (Skarner): so i got minion blocked on blitz's fat ass
[30:59] [All] JasonWazza (Skarner): worthless star guardians
[31:04] [All] JasonWazza (Skarner): doing sweet fuck all
[38:55] JasonWazza (Skarner): you guys are fucking worthless
[39:37] JasonWazza (Skarner): nothing is the answer
[43:02] JasonWazza (Skarner): star guardians still doing nothing
[47:10] JasonWazza (Skarner): so why the fuck
[47:15] JasonWazza (Skarner): are you so far back?

replies.body: or you can learn to laugh it off

Considering this went from no ban history, skipped chat restrictions and went straight to a 14 day ban, this is no laughing matter.

Legit the majority of bronze should be perma banned if this is legitmately what riot thinks is ban worthy.

I was SO toxic the other day, because we played a losing game, and I was saying "Guys, let's surrender," as we were down 6 towers (so all lanes lost 2 towers) so they didn't surrender, and I said come on guys, we have 2 kills to our teams name compared to their 26.
next surrender, didn't surrender.
Then someone rage quit so we were 4v5.
no surrender
no surrender.
Eventually they surrendered, but AFTER I legitimately lost my crap.
I actually feel really bad about what i said.
But in my defence at one point they weren't surrendering to be jerks.
But it was only one game, so :/

Fear the ban hammer, you post on boards so it is coming to you.

Like legit, this ban is clearly targeted at a boards member who would actually post something about it, because this ban is tame as shit.

Again, boards members are not being targeted, what makes you think that? The fact that you post on boards and got banned? Correlation does not = causation. Your chat logs speak for themselves. 

The difference between you and Leviticus is that his was a one time frustration related occurrence, so unless he whipped out the hate speech and homophobia cards he has nothing to fear for a one time incident. 

What it does mean is that he now has a history, and the bigger that history gets, the lesser the line he has to cross before facing a punishment. The exact same applies to you. You continued to be negative, you racked up a history of negativity, and you eventually crossed that line.

> you racked up a history of negativity

Which if this actually applied, would have honestly gotten me banned years ago.

Fuck i hate talking to you now that your the fucking Emissaries, all you do is ass kiss without thought now.

So let me get this straight.. 
Because you fell through the cracks for a few years, that then means that you don't deserve to be banned now? Your chat logs are atrocious. Seriously, try this.. Whenever someone blames you or flames you, just say 'lol' and nothing more

Which is precisely my point, this isn't a case of "If he wasn't banned before why is he now" but rather a case of "he probably should have been banned sooner"

And just cause I'm an emissary doesn't mean I agree with everything Riot does aka ass kiss. I have my disagreements with Riot, specifically about their communication and priorities in certain areas.

I also haven't changed my opinions significantly since becoming an emissary, at most I have a little more faith in the automated system after having a (severely limited) inside perspective and lurking on boards more and seeing the results. Emissary or not I still wouldn't think your behaviour in those games was ok.
eh, first time i've ever been toxic, and i think i only got 1 report anyway (our teemo was happy with me in the end cause i said sorry, and the ezreal was already all g with me, and the yi left)
RIP season rewards
Yeah and for tamer language than most people that will still get rewards.

The way you have carried on buddy is unacceptable, towards Riot employees and to other people on here. As if you dont logically realize "hey maybe i am toxic" Even in the slightest you believe you're 100 Percent innocent and you're completely immature 

I've reported you hoping Riot actually get rid of you, people like YOU are the reason why this game has so much Toxicity. On your other post i tried  be really nice and explain why you got banned but dude it becomes a community issue if you're trying to harass an admin and other players. Change your ways or get perma banned thats all i have to say

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Have a think about what people have said to you and dont be stubborn, Also to end on a brighter note try to have a positive evening

what i want to know is why, all this time, you haven't been banned from the boards. you've been WAY more toxic towards people here than those chat logs. mr. "get to gold 5 and shit talk every person in (slightly)lower elo than you". enjoy your rewards LUL
Hey i've requested to be banned off boards, it lasted 2 days, because whatever rioter did it didn't follow through with it being permanent like i asked.

You haven't really done anything on boards (that I've seen) worthy of a perma ban, and I must have missed that particular request or I would have addressed it. It's also worth noting that we're generally much more lenient here on boards than the systems for in game are, since even in salt posts there is usually valuable discussion that can be had, and it's a means for players to vent some frustration out of game where they aren't really offending anyone.

That said, if you truly do want a permanent boards ban it can probably be arranged, but permanent is permanent so you'd best be sure it's what you want.
wait a minute. so apparently flaming on boards is considered fine and not really offending anybody. but do it in-game (even if its just as banter) and get perm banned. righto.

Don't misunderstand, those who abuse/insult/demean people or otherwise demonstrate such verbal toxicity here on boards will have their posts deleted and will face bans just as they do in game. We try to be more lenient (where we can) on negativity which is not targeted at anyone or is born from frustration/generally harmless. For example If someone posts an all caps swear post about how they hate x champion x much and it just makes them so x rant rant salt overload, we aren't going to delete something like that.

The biggest thing to understand, and that I at least (remember that the mods are people and as such all have slightly differing opinions on what is worth a deletion/ban) always make sure to consider is that boards is a very different environment from in game. Where a non targeted salt post on boards can spawn valuable discussion at little to no cost, in game it only serves to sour the experience for 4-9 other people, and stops the keyboard warrior from playing the game, making them a further detriment.

It does not excuse the behaviour on boards by any means, but if it isn't hurting anyone, then we are happy to leave it be if there is something to be gained from it, which cannot be said for that kind of behaviour in game.

Generally speaking, those who cross the "Don't be a jerk line" only cross it once or twice, so we issue warnings and deletions but don't bother with bans. Those who cross it consistently naturally face bans for it.
___
If you have a specific scenario in mind I'd be happy to clarify what actions I would take for it. 

It's also worth noting that the report feature is there for a reason, and is a feature that is monitored, so if you do find something that breaks the rules, reporting it is the way to go.

_(EDIT: If you've offended someone enough to report you, it's not "just banter". Just because you would react in a certain way to something, doesn't mean everyone else will react the same. I'm a big fan of dark humour, but I also respect that it isn't for everyone, and that many find it distasteful at the very least.)_

One thing I think we can all agree on is that Riots banning system is slack. I've seen players not nearly as toxic as you were, yet they were never banned despite a whole team reporting them.

However, when Riot does ban the punishments are much to harsh. Getting banned for two weeks for what you said is ridiculous. You should have gotten a 10 game mute.
Eyyyy logic is out there somewhere.

the only one I consider report worthy was the second one, the rest were a little mean.
But that could be considered trash talk?

I don't think this is ban worthy at all.
Yeah pretty much, but you know Seras is a kiss ass.
Seras is cool, shut up.

You seem like a bit of a %%%% tbh
> Don't ever defend your teammates from flamers, lest you get reported and banned.

lul? massive contradiction looking at your chat logs. lmao

You flamed and got banned for it. no one is targeting you.

>lul? massive contradiction looking at your chat logs. lmao

Hint: Game 1, with me directing stuff to lux is me defending my team from her flaming all of us, and blaming us for her feeding/losing.
So what is a frequent poster like you going to play now?
I mean i've been playing paladins more than league either way, but when my mates want me to play league, i just play on my smurf which is already 30 and has most of the shit i use anyway.
Keyboard warriors smh.
Maybe you should allchat a little less and just play the game.....
